text:
The 2018 Billboard Music Awards were packed with jaw-dropping, touching and hilarious moments— but one of the sweetest of the night might’ve been host Kelly Clarkson and Simon Cowell’s quick on-stage reunion.

Simon Cowell was a judge on “American Idol” during Kelly Clarkson’s season and, as someone who was known to be incredibly hard to impress, Simon clearly has a soft spot in his heart for KC.

He met Kelly on stage after she’d performed “Whole Lotta Woman,” giving her a huge hug. “Hi everyone,” he said to the crowd. “That was bloody fantastic. What can I say? I’m very proud of you.”

So sweet!
title: Kelly Clarkson and Simon Cowell Reunited at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards and It Was Super Sweet
